about_the_game:
STORY
You are Rini, a charismatic young man with a good heart who just wants to declare himself to his beloved, however, you discover that she was murdered without leaving any sign of the murderer. Now you, with the help of your faithful friend, Eli, plan to travel back in time to try to prevent the murder from occurring. But by a small accident, you have been back more than 60 years in the past.. What would you do to see your loved one again? Would you be able to change your past?

GAME FEATURES
  • More than 140 different enemies with the possibility to generate as a boss or elite, with more hp, damage, extra skills, exp and loot (Partial).
  • Over 30 achievements to unlock! (In Full Version).
  • More than 120 items of exclusive manufacture (Partial).
  • More than 60 NPCs with different stories (Partial).
  • Choose from 3 types of Classes (In Full Version).
  • Different types of talent trees to improve (In Full Version).
  • Explore the world in 5 different time periods (In Full Version).
  • Interact with NPCs and events and try to save the Past, Present and Future, from a cruel fate (Partial).

short_description: (Demo) Tormenta do Tempo is an Hack N Slash Action RPG about Time Travel. Find out all about the origin of time travel, annihilate hordes of enemies, choose from 3 types of classes, grow your talent tree, loots, and try to save the Past, Present and Future, from a cruel fate.
